g.text: screen: Obsverve the ptc functions in 2d

svg.g:
/* text what to do */ screen: Obsverve the ptc functions in 2d and transform to 3d. check if there is a
* relation to the function 'daZip'
* there should be 1d graphs connecting the vertices (points) how can that be achievd and how does that pay out in the transformation?
* include a timer or watch
an example
ptc6; Aa Ee Ii Oo Uu -> pv1:Aa pv2:AaEe pv3:Ee pv4:Ii pv5:IiOo pv6:Oo
ptc6; AAABB AABAB AAA BBBAA -> pv1:AAABB pv2:AAABBAABAB pv3:AABAB pv4:AAA pv5:AAABBBAA pv6:BBBAA
ptc6; AAAaaBBbb AAaaBbAaBb AAAaaa BBBbbbAAaa -> pv1:AAAaaBBbb pv2:AAAaaaBBbb...
ptc6; Case1 all small letters
ptc6; abcdefg hijklmn opqrst uvwxyz -> pv1:abcdefg pv2:abcdefghijklmn pv3:hij...
ptc6; ABCDE FGHIJKLMN OPQRST UVWXYZ -> pv1:ABCDEFG pv2:ABC.. pv3:HIJ...
ptc6; AaBbCcDdEe FfGgHhIiJj... -> pv1:AaBbCcDdEeFfGg pv2:AaBbCc.. pv3:HhIiJj...
Test+: mix in arythmetic operator+ in 2 3 5 7 rythm, find a nice hexagon that fits ?
ptc6; Aa+BbCcDdEe FfGgHhI+iJj... -> pv1:Aa+BbCcDdEeFfGg pv2:Aa+BbCc.. pv3:HhI+iJj...
ptc6; Aa+BbCcDdEe ... -> pv1:Aa+BbCcDdEeFfGg pv4:OoPpQqRrSsTt.. pv1 ..pv3 as Test+ pv4 ..pv6 without operator+ yields the same as above pv1 ..pv4 as Test+ pv5 ..pv6 without operator+ yields something different
MQ3 1..4, just line1 progVar1 = show(tussenStap 1 1) progVar2 = (show (tussenStap 1 1))++(show(tussenStap 1 2)) progVar3 = (show(tussenStap 1 2)) progVar4 = (show(tussenStap 1 3)) progVar5 = (show (tussenStap 1 3))++(show(tussenStap 1 4)) progVar6 = (show(tussenStap 1 4)) file: ptclibrary/mq3withTussenstapLine1ptc6.png
MQ3 1..4, line4 error but runs progVar1 = show(tussenStap 1 1) progVar2 = (show (tussenStap 1 1))++(show(tussenStap 2 2)) progVar3 = (show(tussenStap 2 2)) progVar4 = (show(tussenStap 3 3)) progVar5 = (show (tussenStap 3 3))++(show(tussenStap 3 4)) progVar6 = (show(tussenStap 3 4)) note! tussenStap 4 4 should yield an error choose Int>4 file: ptclibrary/mq3withTussenstapLine1to3ptc6.png
hexagon plane adjustable area Test animation clientX : 0 clientY : 0 screenX : 0 screenY : 0
